Description: A modeling software that provides numerical solutions of ocean, sea-ice, tracers and biochemistry equations and their related physics. Also allows two-way nesting via the AGRIF software..

Name: ISGS Seismometer Data
Description: A software running continuously streaming seismometer data for the state of Illinois. Seismograph shows vertical, horizontal (both East-West, and North-South directions)..

Name: Planet Simulator (Plasim)
Description: A modeling software that is a coupled system of climate components for Earth, Mars and other planets developed as a model of intermediate complexity..

Name: nbcf.R
Description: Software script for non-bootstrapped correlation function. Code written in R for another script, may require necessary call name substitution..

Name: acf
Description: Software that codes for an autocorrelation function and confidence limits.  Code written in MatLab for another script, may require necessary call name substitution..

Name: CLIM-X-DETECT
Description: A software code for detecting extremes against a time-dependent background in climate and weather time series..
